snippet: The pharmaceutical industry must be encouraged to develop new drugs to supplement those that are losing their effectiveness.
abstract: Editorial warns of grave threat presented by antibiotic-resistant germs around world, citing landmark survey by the World Health Organization; holds that most urgent need is to curb overuse of antibiotics in medicine and agriculture, adding that pharmaceutical industry must be encouraged to develop new drugs to supplement those that are losing their effectiveness.
lead_paragraph: The pharmaceutical industry must be encouraged to develop new drugs to supplement those that are losing their effectiveness.
